answers.answer: I've had 4 vaginal births and 3 c sections (no contractions with those 3) but mine ranged from 22 and a half hours being the longest to 9 hours being the shortest
I also have had 4 vaginal births. My first was the longest. From the very 1st contraction I felt to her actual birth was 20 1/2 hours. The next 3 were short, between 7-9 hours from start to finish.
With my first I had them for 3 days. My second was 4 hrs. I'm hoping this one goes fast like my second
Oh wow! I want a 4 hour labor...lucky! Lol.

10 hours then an emergency c-section... Had to many contractions back to back my Lil girls heart stopped and they rushed me in to the slicer...lol.... Everything was OK she is one now and I'm on my second...
I started having contractions at 1 am and had my daughter that night at 4:09pm.
Well I was induced with my first and I considered labor from the time the contractions started and it lasted 7hrs from start to finish.
I was in labor for 12 hours with my first
With my first i was in labor with him for 17hrs n my second i had contractions for a week but were not consistent the day of his birth i was in labor with him for 7hrs
From the first contraction to delivery 6hrs with my first. He's just as impatient at 2yrs old lol.
Waters broke at 1.30am. Painful contractions started at 5am. My son was born at 10.20pm.
They had to suction him out so may have gone longer. ..
They told me i was having preterm contractions and i been having them since saturday they got them to space out but couldn't stop them completely

With my first i started getting contractions around 5 am on 5/20 she was born 5/21 at 7:50 am. With my second i started getting contractions around 10 pm on 4/26, she was born 4/27 at 11:35 am. I hope for a quick delivery with my little boy in January!

I am pregnant with my second....and I am hoping it is way better than the first... Towards the last week with my daughter I had high blood pressure...( preeclampsia) so they induced me. I was in labor for 36 hours with no epidural. Couldnt get the epidural because of low platelets.....It was the worst!! I just hope that I have a much better experience! :-)

question: How long did you have contractions before you gave birth?
title: question
